name: Traveller
description:
---------------------------------

MADE FOR GMTK 2020

---------------------------------

Hitchhike across town to get to your destination as fast as you can!  Watch out cause drivers have a tendency to throw people out of their cars!

--------------------------------- 

CONTROLS: 

- Space - Get in vehicles

---------------------------------

THEME: Out of Control

Connection To Theme: The player has to get to their destination in the city but they have no control of how they get there.

---------------------------------

You will take control of multiple people across the city and have to get them to their destination as fast as possible. You can only move on sidewalks and get in vehicles. This means you have to strategize and time the best way to get to your destination. Your destination is indicated by the giant golden arrow above the building. The stopwatch at the top indicates how long it has taken you to complete the level.

---------------------------------

Team

Noah - Level Design, Programming,

Shane - AI, UI

Jimmy - Artist, Modeler

---------------------------------

---------------------------------

Known Bugs:

- Tutorial Button Not Working

- Vehicle Jam Ups

- Player Gets Stuck Outside of Bounds

Planned Features: 

  • Many Levels
  • Upgrades
    • Drivable tank that can destroy buildings
    • Natural disasters
    • Subway System
  • Day Night
